text: the trade desk is a SAS platform that
enables our clients who are media buyers
so typically advertising agencies to
make data-driven
purchasing decisions on individual
opportunities to deliver our marketing
messages so essentially we buy ad space
programmatically at massive scale
we process over 800 billion queries a
day in terms of latency we have a budget
but our average response time is about
10 milliseconds about 100 a second we've
recently begun shifting more and more of
our bidding workload which is our
highest scale workload into the cloud it
used to take somewhere between 3 to 4
sometimes up to 6 months to build out a
new site when we were entering a new
market with bidding in the cloud on AWS
that's cut down to 2 to 3 weeks and a
lot of that time is just hydrating
caches the actual build time is less
than a week there's much more much more
agility where if we need to tune a site
we can make changes much more quickly we
will do more iteration in a single week
than we might do in in a full year on a
managed physical site we have much
better talent utilization of our own
team even though AWS is obviously a
highly virtualized environment we have
much finer grained control over that
environment than we do in a managed
physical site
